name: Desert Golfing (2017)
description:
Golf across an endless desert in Desert Golfing.

This game features infinite randomly generated terrain to golf across.

Use your mouse to swing your club.

Is there and end to the desert or does it go forever?


To see a world in a bunker of sand
And a heaven in a wild cactus,
Hold infinity in the pocket of your shorts,
And eternity in Desert Golfing.
